description: This Java source file defines an abstract class 'ServiceHandle' that encapsulates basic information about a service, including its name, ports, and visibility, along with abstract methods to determine its process and host relation.

classes.name: ServiceHandle
classes.description: An abstract class representing a service with identification and visibility properties, providing methods to access metadata and abstract methods to determine the service's execution context.

methods.name: ServiceHandle
methods.description: Constructor initializing the service handle with name, ports, and visibility.

methods.name: ServiceHandle
methods.description: Overloaded constructor initializing the service handle with name, ports, and specified visibility.

methods.name: getServiceName
methods.description: Returns the name of the service.

methods.name: getVisibility
methods.description: Returns the visibility attribute of the service.

methods.name: isSameProcess
methods.description: Abstract method to determine if the service runs in the same process.

methods.name: isLocalHost
methods.description: Abstract method to determine if the service runs on the same host.

methods.name: isRemoteHost
methods.description: Abstract method to determine if the service runs on a different host.
